name: Ascending Madness
detailed_description:
Ascending Madness is a fast psychedelic shooter that follows the journey of a merciless bounty hunter as he experiences increasingly manic episodes while on a mission.

The Mission?

Assassinate a renegade scientist and her group of devout followers who appear to have gone completely insane.


  • Perform breakneck combat while fluidly outmaneuvering waves of bizarre monstrosities across diverse combat arenas
  • Utilize eight futuristic weapons and upgrade your Battlecraft to overcome dangerous foes that test the limits of your skill and quick decision making ability
  • Feel your grip on reality slip as you experience increasing hallucinatory visions and uncover deeper motivations of a mysterious cult of scientists known as ‘The People’s Gate’.
  • Take in a colorful yet gritty atmosphere and art style taking place across a vast alien planet and perhaps beyond
  • Discover the meaning of life


  • Be forced to grind for meaningless hours to level up
  • Have to devote a chunk of your life just to learn the 'mechanics' of the game
  • Feel cheated by anything procedurally generated or NOT handcrafted with care
  • Ever be the same again

Come take a psychedelic combat cruise down the river of madness.
